title: Daily COVID-19 Cases in Scotland
description: This dataset replaces the "COVID-19 Statistical report" dataset and provides information on number of new daily confirmed cases, negative cases and deaths from novel coronavirus (COVID-19) in Scotland, including cumulative totals and population rates at Scotland, NHS Board and Council Area levels.
datasetNotes: On landing page, scroll down to dataset under heading "Data and Resources".
sizingNotes: Data is in both open and CSV format, so should be straightforward transfer into PMD.
